description: React component implementing the main page of a simple note-taking application, managing notes state, rendering header, notes list, and note editor components, and handling note creation, selection, update, and deletion.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: React functional component serving as the main page, managing notes state, and rendering UI components.

methods.name: handleCreate
methods.description: Creates a new blank note, adds it to the state, and selects it.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Handles selecting a note by its ID.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID, with confirmation prompt, and updates the state accordingly.

methods.name: handlePatchSelected
methods.description: Applies partial updates to the selected note.

methods.name: handleSaveSelected
methods.description: Updates the timestamp of the selected note to simulate saving and sorts notes.
